source:
TEXT_FESEST601_03846_SEQ_00The revelrous rabbit in Mih Khetto's Amphitheatre wishes to share the joy of Hatchingtide with you.
※This quest is available for a limited time only.
target:
TEXT_FESEST601_03846_SEQ_00* Cette quête est un événement à durée limitée.

La lapine enjouée est là pour parler Prœufs, parler bien.

source:
TEXT_FESEST601_03846_SEQ_01In Mih Khetto's Amphitheatre, you come upon Jihli Aliapoh, who regales you with the history of the event known as Hatchingtide─a festival born of her vision of the Twelve Archons of the Sixth Umbral Era. As she tells it, this year she was blessed with another vision: this one not of storied heroes, but of fluffy rabbits─which may in part explain her curious appearance. Though what she has in mind is not immediately clear, one thing is: she requires your aid to make the festival a success. Should you be inclined to lend your assistance, seek out her colleague Nonotta by the Carline Canopy and see what you might do on the celebrants' behalf.

※Please note that you will be unable to complete this quest after the seasonal event has ended. For details, please check the Lodestone.
target:
TEXT_FESEST601_03846_SEQ_01Cette quête ne peut être commencée et effectuée que pendant la durée de l'événement saisonnier correspondant. Pour plus de détails, veuillez consulter The Lodestone.

Abonnée aux songes surréalistes, Jihli Aliapoh a cette fois rêvé de lapins débarquant en Éorzéa pour faire le bonheur des enfants, ce qui l'a poussée à promouvoir sa fameuse chasse aux Prœufs vêtue d'un costume de léporidé du plus bon goût. Dans votre grande bonté, vous avez accepté de l'aider à concrétiser sa singulière vision. Pour savoir exactement quelle tâche vous incombe, commencez par retrouver son amie Nonotta près des Feuilles de carline.

source: TEXT_FESEST601_03846_SEQ_02<tab>You find Nonotta, herself curiously dressed as an oversized hare, who is all too eager to share with you her plight. To wit, a veritable legion of chickens painstakingly procured by her and Jihli have flown the coop, placing their meticulous plans for this year's festivities in peril. Put your hen-hunting skills to the test and go forth to recover these exceptional egg-laying specimens, that the celebration might not meet a premature demise.
target: TEXT_FESEST601_03846_SEQ_02<tab>Nonotta, l'amie de Jihli elle aussi déguisée en lapine, a mal<var 16 /var>en<var 16 /var>con<var 16 /var>treu<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ment laissé s'échapper les poules pondeuses dont elle avait la charge. Elle compte sur vous pour rattraper les évadées, et sa bévue par la même occasion. Rendez-vous dans la Forêt centrale et parlez à l'un des organisateurs de la chasse aux Prœufs pour obtenir un costume de <var 08 E905 ((lapine)) ((lapin)) /var>, puis accomplissez l'ALÉA “Poules parties”.

source: TEXT_FESEST601_03846_SEQ_03<tab>After a hair-raising, feather-ruffling encounter, you succeed in tracking down the chickens as per Nonotta's request. Report back to your client and let her know that the deed is done.
target: TEXT_FESEST601_03846_SEQ_03<tab><var 08 E905 ((Armée)) ((Armé)) /var> de boules de glu collantes à souhait, vous avez aidé les quelques lap... bénévoles déjà sur place à attraper un maximum de cocottes. Reprenez à présent votre souffle et retournez voir Nonotta, près des Feuilles de carline.

source: TEXT_FESEST601_03846_SEQ_04<tab>Nonotta rejoices that you have successfully tracked down all of her lost chickens and led them back to the coop. She bids you join her back at Mih Khetto's Amphitheatre, where you might share the news of your triumph with her compatriot Jihli Aliapoh.
target: TEXT_FESEST601_03846_SEQ_04<tab>Nonotta n'avait pas d'autres tâches à vous confier. Suivez-la à l'amphithéâtre de Mih Khetto, et parlez à Jihli Aliapoh.

source: TEXT_FESEST601_03846_SEQ_05<tab>Back at the amphitheatre, Jihli rejoices upon hearing that the chickens have been returned, allowing Hatching<var 1F /var>tide to begin in earnest. After Nonotta takes her leave, Jihli informs you in secret that she believes you to be the key to the success of this year's festivities. If you feel so inclined, wait around and offer your aid when the time is right.
target: TEXT_FESEST601_03846_SEQ_05<tab>En récompense de votre labeur, vous avez reçu un seyant costume de <var 08 E905 ((lapine)) ((lapin)) /var>, que vous aurez très pro<var 16 /var>ba<var 16 /var>ble<var 16 /var>ment l'occasion de revêtir lors de l'événement surprise concocté par Jihli Aliapoh et ses collègues... Reparlez à cette dernière lorsque les festivités débuteront.

TEXT_FESEST601_03846_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Nonotta near the Carline Canopy.
target: TEXT_FESEST601_03846_TODO_00<tab>Chercher Nonotta, près des Feuilles de carline

source: TEXT_FESEST601_03846_TODO_01<tab>Complete the FATE “A Cluckin' Catastrophe” in the Central Shroud.
target: TEXT_FESEST601_03846_TODO_01<tab>Accomplir l'ALÉA “Poules parties”, dans la Forêt centrale

source: TEXT_FESEST601_03846_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Nonotta.
TEXT_FESEST601_03846_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Jihli Aliapoh.
TEXT_FESEST601_03846_TODO_04<tab>
TEXT_FESEST601_03846_TODO_05<tab>
TEXT_FESEST601_03846_TODO_06<tab>
TEXT_FESEST601_03846_TODO_07<tab>
TEXT_FESEST601_03846_TODO_08<tab>
TEXT_FESEST601_03846_TODO_09<tab>
TEXT_FESEST601_03846_TODO_10<tab>
TEXT_FESEST601_03846_TODO_11<tab>
TEXT_FESEST601_03846_TODO_12<tab>
TEXT_FESEST601_03846_TODO_13<tab>
TEXT_FESEST601_03846_TODO_14<tab>
TEXT_FESEST601_03846_TODO_15<tab>
TEXT_FESEST601_03846_TODO_16<tab>
TEXT_FESEST601_03846_TODO_17<tab>
TEXT_FESEST601_03846_TODO_18<tab>
TEXT_FESEST601_03846_TODO_19<tab>
TEXT_FESEST601_03846_TODO_20<tab>
TEXT_FESEST601_03846_TODO_21<tab>
TEXT_FESEST601_03846_TODO_22<tab>
TEXT_FESEST601_03846_TODO_23<tab>
TEXT_FESEST601_03846_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_001<tab>Come one, come all! For Hatching<var 1F /var>tide is upon us once more!
target: TEXT_FESEST601_03846_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_001<tab>Noirs, blancs, jaunes ou bleus<var 1D /var>! C'est le grand retourrr de la fête des œufs<var 1D /var>!♪

source: TEXT_FESEST601_03846_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_002<tab>Well, if it isn't <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Back to enjoy the festivities for another year, are we? I could not be more pleased to welcome you once again.
target: TEXT_FESEST601_03846_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_002<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, quelle bonne surrrprise<var 1D /var>! Tu ne te lasses pas de la chasse aux Prœufs, hein<var 1D /var>? Moi non plus<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST601_03846_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_003<tab>(-Jihli Aliapoh-)Hm? Do you not recognize me? It's me, your old friend Jihli Aliapoh!
target: TEXT_FESEST601_03846_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_003<tab>Ben quoi, tu me remets pas<var 1D /var>?<var 1D /var>... Ah, suis-je bête, je porrrte un costume<var 1D /var>! C'est moi, Jihli<var 1D /var>! Jihli Aliapoh<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST601_03846_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_004<tab>(-Jihli Aliapoh-)My name is Jihli Aliapoh, and it's a pleasure to make your acquaintance. No doubt you're wondering why I'm dressed the way I am. But do not worry─all will be clear in due time.
target: TEXT_FESEST601_03846_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_004<tab>Moi, c'est Jihli<var 1D /var>! Jihli Aliapoh<var 1D /var>! Au cas où tu te poserais la question<var 1D /var>: non, je ne suis pas une vrrraie lapine. Je suis une Miqo'te<var 1D /var>; ça, c'est juste un costume<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST601_03846_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_005<tab>(-Jihli Aliapoh-)Now, don't tell me... You are an adventurer, yes? Well, you certainly have the inquisitive nature of one, at any rate! May I ask your name?
target: TEXT_FESEST601_03846_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_005<tab>(-Jihli Aliapoh-)Et toi, tu es <var 08 E905 ((une aventurière)) ((un aventurier)) /var>, ça ne fait aucun doute<var 1D /var>! C'est quoi ton petit nom<var 1D /var>? Si tu ne me le dis pas, je vais devoirrr t'appeler <var 08 E905 ((Madame)) ((Monsieur)) /var> Lapinou<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST601_03846_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_006<tab>(-Jihli Aliapoh-)Well then, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I should probably mention that Hatching<var 1F /var>tide all began with a vision I had before the Seventh Umbral Calamity, in which the Twelve Archons delivered unto me a message.
target: TEXT_FESEST601_03846_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_006<tab>(-Jihli Aliapoh-)Enchantée, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>! Tu as déjà entendu parrrler de la chasse aux Prœufs<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESEST601_03846_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_007<tab>(-Jihli Aliapoh-)From atop their giant, decorated eggs they called to me: “Arise, young Dreamer, and make ready the vessels for our return.” When I awoke, I quickly set about filling the realm with all manner of painted ovoids. And thus did this joyous yearly celebration come to be!
target: TEXT_FESEST601_03846_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_007<tab>(-Jihli Aliapoh-)C'est un événement festif que j'ai créé il y a plusieurs années, juste avant le dernier fléau. L'idée m'est venue après avoir fait un rêve trrrès étrange...

source: TEXT_FESEST601_03846_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_008<tab>(-Jihli Aliapoh-)And before you ask─yes, this costume is the result of yet another vision. I but recently dreamt that a veritable horde of hippity, hoppity rabbits descended on the realm for Hatching<var 1F /var>tide, delighting children far and wide with their button-cute noses and cotton-white tails.
target: TEXT_FESEST601_03846_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_008<tab>(-Jihli Aliapoh-)Tu te demandes peut-être pourquoi je suis habillée comme ça<var 1D /var>? Eh bien c'est simple<var 1D /var>: cette année, j'ai rêvé de lapins<var 1D /var>; des lapins multicolores qui débarquent dans les villes et villages pour faire le bonheurrr des enfants<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST601_03846_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_009<tab>(-Jihli Aliapoh-)“Why rabbits?” you may ask, and the question is a valid one. After all, rabbits do not lay eggs, nor are they traditionally associated with the Archons in any particular way.
target: TEXT_FESEST601_03846_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_009<tab>(-Jihli Aliapoh-)Mes songes sont souvent prémonitoirrres, mais j'aurais bien du mal à dire ce que celui-là présage... Sûrement que du bon, comme d'habitude<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST601_03846_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_010<tab>(-Jihli Aliapoh-)Unfortunately, I have no answers to that question. And yet, so vividly do I remember the smiles on the faces of each and every youngling in my dream that I swore I would bring this vision of Hatching-tide to life. Might you be so kind as to lend me a hand?
target: TEXT_FESEST601_03846_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_010<tab>(-Jihli Aliapoh-)Brrref, il n'en fallait pas plus pour qu'on se retrousse les manches, Nonotta, moi et les autres. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, tu serais <var 08 E905 ((partante)) ((partant)) /var> pour aider notre troupe de joyeux drilles<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESEST601_03846_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_FESEST601_03846_A1_000_001<tab>Sounds eggcellent to me!
TEXT_FESEST601_03846_A1_000_002<tab>I can find no eggscuse not to...

TEXT_FESEST601_03846_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_012<tab>(-Jihli Aliapoh-)Oh, thank you, my friend! With your aid, I have no doubt that this year's incarnation of Hatching<var 1F /var>tide will be the most exciting and extravagant yet!
target: TEXT_FESEST601_03846_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_012<tab>(-Jihli Aliapoh-)Wouhou<var 1D /var>! Je savais que tu dirrrais oui<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST601_03846_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_013<tab>(-Jihli Aliapoh-)And so, without further ado, I would encourage you to seek out my associate Nonotta near the Carline Canopy. She will be most happy to enlighten you as to how you might assist us in making this year's festivities something to remember!
target: TEXT_FESEST601_03846_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_013<tab>(-Jihli Aliapoh-)Pour commencer, va voir Nonotta, c'est elle qui gère nos prrréparatifs. La dernière fois que je l'ai vue, c'était près des Feuilles de carline.

source: TEXT_FESEST601_03846_NONOTTA_000_050<tab>The happiest of Hatching<var 1F /var>tides to you, my dear!
target: TEXT_FESEST601_03846_NONOTTA_000_050<tab>C'est la fête des œufs... qui rendent les gens heur... œufs<var 1D /var>!♪

source: TEXT_FESEST601_03846_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_FESEST601_03846_A2_000_001<tab>I'm looking for Nonotta.
TEXT_FESEST601_03846_A2_000_002<tab>And to you.
TEXT_FESEST601_03846_A2_000_003<tab>That voice...
target: TEXT_FESEST601_03846_A2_000_003<tab>Cette voix de crécelle... Nonotta, c'est toi<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESEST601_03846_NONOTTA_000_052<tab>(-Nonotta-)I may have more fur and whiskers than usual, but I can assure you that it is me inside this most charming costume. Nonotta, that is.
target: TEXT_FESEST601_03846_NONOTTA_000_052<tab>Héhé... Moi, je m'appelle Nonotta... ou petit lapin rose, c'est du pareil au même<var 1D /var>!♪

source: TEXT_FESEST601_03846_NONOTTA_000_053<tab>(-Nonotta-)You recognized me? Oh, how astute you are, my adventuring friend! Indeed, it is none other than I─Nonotta!
target: TEXT_FESEST601_03846_NONOTTA_000_053<tab>Eh oui, c'est bien m... Comment ça une voix de crécelle<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_FESEST601_03846_NONOTTA_000_054<tab>(-Nonotta-)Greetings, my adventuring friend! I trust you are enjoying the festivities? Jihli and I have spared no effort or expense to make this year's Hatching<var 1F /var>tide the best Eorzea has seen!
target: TEXT_FESEST601_03846_NONOTTA_000_054<tab>(-Nonotta-)Tu connais Jihli Aliapoh<var 1D /var>? Elle et moi, on est copines... comme lapines<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST601_03846_NONOTTA_000_055<tab>(-Nonotta-)Now, pray tell, what might I do for you?
target: TEXT_FESEST601_03846_NONOTTA_000_055<tab>(-Nonotta-)Passons, passons... Qu'est-ce qui t'amène<var 1D /var>? Dis-moi tout.

source: TEXT_FESEST601_03846_NONOTTA_000_056<tab>(-Nonotta-)Come to help with the festivities, you say? Your presence is most welcome, and then some! Jihli and I have our hands─or should I say paws?─full here, and we would be most indebted to you for your assistance.
target: TEXT_FESEST601_03846_NONOTTA_000_056<tab>(-Nonotta-)Oh, tu veux nous donner un coup de main... je veux dire, de patte de lapin<var 1D /var>? Quelle chance<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST601_03846_NONOTTA_000_057<tab>(-Nonotta-)Allow me to explain. In the hopes of turning this year's Hatching<var 1F /var>tide into a true event for the ages, we scoured the realm and procured a host of chickens that would lay for us the most remarkable eggs.
target: TEXT_FESEST601_03846_NONOTTA_000_057<tab>(-Nonotta-)On a justement un problème urgent à régler. Je m'explique<var 1D /var>: pour avoir plein d'œufs à distribuer durant la fête, Jihli et moi, on s'est lancées il y a quelque temps dans l'élevage de poules pondeuses.

source: TEXT_FESEST601_03846_NONOTTA_000_058<tab>(-Nonotta-)Sadly, the other day, I got distracted for a moment and neglected to properly shut the door to the storehouse where we were keeping them. Before I knew it, the birds had all flown the proverbial─or literal, in this case─coop.
target: TEXT_FESEST601_03846_NONOTTA_000_058<tab>(-Nonotta-)Rien de bien difficile... Sauf que tout à l'heure, j'étais tellement pressée d'enfiler mon costume que je suis partie en laissant leur cage grande ouverte. Résultat, ce qui devait arriver arriva<var 1D /var>: envolée, la volaille<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST601_03846_NONOTTA_000_059<tab>(-Nonotta-)Needless to say, without our hens, there can be no eggs. And without our eggs, there can be no Hatching<var 1F /var>tide! Surely you can see our plight? And so I beg of you, my friend: please go out there and catch our precious birds before they are swallowed up by the beasts that prowl the wood.
target: TEXT_FESEST601_03846_NONOTTA_000_059<tab>(-Nonotta-)À l'heure qu'il est, j'imagine qu'elle est en train de batifoler dans la Forêt centrale. En clair, je compte sur toi pour rattraper toutes ces poulettes en vadrouille<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST601_03846_NONOTTA_000_060<tab>(-Nonotta-)I have but one more small request for you, and that is that you don one of these lovely rabbit suits and wear it while you go about the deed. Why, you ask? Let it suffice to say that Jihli's visions have never led us astray before, and I do not expect this to change.
target: TEXT_FESEST601_03846_NONOTTA_000_060<tab>(-Nonotta-)Plusieurs de nos collègues sont déjà sur place, ils te prêteront du matériel pour te faciliter la tâche... et aussi un costume de <var 08 E905 ((lapine)) ((lapin)) /var>, parce que c'est quand même le thème de la fête<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST601_03846_NONOTTA_000_061<tab>(-Nonotta-)You may be skeptical now, but believe me─once you put it on, you'll not readily want to part with it. And that's why I'm happy to say that we will be happy to gift one to you in commemoration of your efforts should you see the task through to completion!
target: TEXT_FESEST601_03846_NONOTTA_000_061<tab>(-Nonotta-)Je pourrai même t'en offrir un, mais seulement si tu nous aides jusqu'au bout. C'est pas mal comme carotte, non<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESEST601_03846_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_065<tab>Did you manage to speak with Nonotta? If you can't find her, remember: she should be dressed not unlike I am.
target: TEXT_FESEST601_03846_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_065<tab>Va voir Nonotta, c'est elle qui gère nos prrréparatifs. La dernière fois que je l'ai vue, c'était près des Feuilles de carline.

source: TEXT_FESEST601_03846_NONOTTA_000_100<tab>Oh, friend! You must track down our precious chickens! Our painstaking preparations for this year's Hatching<var 1F /var>tide will be all for naught if you cannot!
target: TEXT_FESEST601_03846_NONOTTA_000_100<tab>Les poules se sont carapatées dans la Forêt centrale. Rattrape-les, ou c'est la pénurie d'œufs assurée<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST601_03846_NONOTTA_000_150<tab>Welcome back, friend! I'm pleased to inform you that we've counted our chickens, and they've all safely returned to the coop! Truly, you have done us─no, all of Eorzea─a great service this day.
target: TEXT_FESEST601_03846_NONOTTA_000_150<tab>Ça y est, tu as rattrapé nos cocottes<var 1D /var>? Merci infiniment<var 1D /var>! Ces coquines ne t'ont pas trop fait courir, j'espère<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST601_03846_NONOTTA_000_151<tab>And without further ado, I must report back to Jihli and share these good tidings. If you have no other pressing matters, pray join me. I'm quite certain our lead celebrant will want to offer her thanks in person.
target: TEXT_FESEST601_03846_NONOTTA_000_151<tab>Grâce à toi, le mal est réparé, et la fête va enfin pouvoir démarrer<var 1D /var>! Allons annoncer la bonne nouvelle à Jihli de ce pas<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST601_03846_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_200<tab>Nonotta! And <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! I hear that─in no small part thanks to you─our most confounding chicken conundrum has been solved.
target: TEXT_FESEST601_03846_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_200<tab>Ah, te voilà. Nonotta m'a dit que tu nous avais rendu un fierrr service.

source: TEXT_FESEST601_03846_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_201<tab>
TEXT_FESEST601_03846_Q3_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_FESEST601_03846_A3_000_001<tab>I found your chickens, all right.
TEXT_FESEST601_03846_A3_000_002<tab>Eggceptional work, if I do say so myself.

TEXT_FESEST601_03846_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_202<tab>Indeed, you have performed a most eggceptional service for us here today! Yes, you are truly a par<var 1A 02 /var>egg<var 1A 01 /var>on among adventurers! An <var 1A 02 /var>eggs<var 1A 01 /var>emplar of─ahem, forgive me.
target: TEXT_FESEST601_03846_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_202<tab>Je ne sais pas de quoi tu parrrles, mais tu m'as l'air de t'être bien amusé<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var>. Tant mieux<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST601_03846_JIHLIALIAPOH_100_202<tab>Yes, you are truly a par<var 1A 02 /var>egg<var 1A 01 /var>on among adventurers! An <var 1A 02 /var>eggs<var 1A 01 /var>emplar of─ahem, forgive me.
target: TEXT_FESEST601_03846_JIHLIALIAPOH_100_202<tab>Hiii<var 1D /var>! Ç-ça va pas de caqueter comme ça, sans prévenirrr<var 1D /var>!? Tu veux me faire bondir de trouille ou quoi<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESEST601_03846_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_203<tab>At any rate, thanks to you, we can at long last begin the festivities in earnest! Let the curtain rise on a Hatching<var 1F /var>tide to remember!
target: TEXT_FESEST601_03846_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_203<tab>Où en étais-je... Ah oui. Les préparatifs sont terminés, on va pouvoirrr donner le coup d'envoi de la fête<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST601_03846_NONOTTA_000_204<tab>As promised, you will now be rewarded with a stylish rabbit costume of your very own.
target: TEXT_FESEST601_03846_NONOTTA_000_204<tab>Avant ça, ta récompense<var 1D /var>! Comme promis, voici ton costume de <var 08 E905 ((lapine)) ((lapin)) /var> flambant neuf, avec nos re<var 16 /var>mer<var 16 /var>cie<var 16 /var>ments<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST601_03846_NONOTTA_000_205<tab>We'd be most <var 1A 02 /var>egg<var 1A 01 /var>preciative─ah, that doesn't quite work, does it?─if you could don it for the duration of the festivities to add an extra touch of charm and delight to the celebration.
target: TEXT_FESEST601_03846_NONOTTA_000_205<tab>Enfile-le et va répandre la joie<var 1D /var>! Tu verras, c'est trop bien de se déguiser<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST601_03846_NONOTTA_000_206<tab>And with that, I had best get back to my post before the chickens run off again!
target: TEXT_FESEST601_03846_NONOTTA_000_206<tab>Sur ce, j'ai du travail, alors à plus tard<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST601_03846_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_207<tab>Don't tell Nonotta I said this, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, but I am counting on <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> as much as anyone to make this year's Hatching<var 1F /var>tide a resounding success. Promise that you won't go far, will you?
target: TEXT_FESEST601_03846_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_207<tab>Je ne peux pas te révéler le clou du spectacle, mais sache que ta par<var 16 /var>ti<var 16 /var>ci<var 16 /var>pa<var 16 /var>tion serait vivement apprrréciée... Reviens me voir dès que ça commencera, d'accord<var 1D /var>?<var 1D /var>... Et n'oublie pas ton costume<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST601_03846_SYSTEM_000_300<tab>This marks the conclusion of the first quest for this year's Hatching<var 1F /var>tide. For details on when the second quest will be available, please check the Lodestone.
target: TEXT_FESEST601_03846_SYSTEM_000_300<tab>Vous avez accompli la quête préliminaire de l'événement saisonnier “La chasse aux Prœufs”. Pour connaître les modalités d'accès à la quête suivante, veuillez consulter The Lodestone.

source: TEXT_FESEST601_03846_NONOTTA_000_210<tab>I can't thank you enough for returning our chickens, friend. Jihli is positively overjoyed to know that the festivities will be able to go on just as she envisioned them!
target: TEXT_FESEST601_03846_NONOTTA_000_210<tab>(Pas un mot à Jihli à propos des poules, d'accord<var 1D /var>?)
